verses.text: \w In|strong="H3068"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w say|strong="H7725"\w*: “\w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w praise|strong="H3034"\w* \w You|strong="H3588"\w*. \w Although|strong="H3588"\w* \w You|strong="H3588"\w* \w were|strong="H3117"\w* angry \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w me|strong="H7725"\w*, \w Your|strong="H3068"\w* anger \w has|strong="H3068"\w* \w turned|strong="H7725"\w* \w away|strong="H7725"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w You|strong="H3588"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w comforted|strong="H5162"\w* \w me|strong="H7725"\w*.

\w Surely|strong="H3588"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* \w salvation|strong="H3444"\w*; \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* trust \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w afraid|strong="H6342"\w*. \w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w GOD|strong="H3068"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* \w strength|strong="H5797"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* \w song|strong="H2176"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w He|strong="H3588"\w* \w also|strong="H3068"\w* \w has|strong="H3068"\w* \w become|strong="H1961"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* \w salvation|strong="H3444"\w*.”

\w With|strong="H4325"\w* \w joy|strong="H8342"\w* \w you|strong="H4325"\w* \w will|strong="H4325"\w* \w draw|strong="H7579"\w* \w water|strong="H4325"\w* \w from|strong="H3444"\w* \w the|strong="H4325"\w* \w springs|strong="H4599"\w* \w of|strong="H4325"\w* \w salvation|strong="H3444"\w*,

\w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w on|strong="H3117"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* say: “\w Give|strong="H3034"\w* \w praise|strong="H3034"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*; \w proclaim|strong="H7121"\w* \w His|strong="H3068"\w* \w name|strong="H8034"\w*! \w Make|strong="H3045"\w* \w His|strong="H3068"\w* \w works|strong="H5949"\w* \w known|strong="H3045"\w* \w among|strong="H8034"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w peoples|strong="H5971"\w*; \w declare|strong="H3045"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w His|strong="H3068"\w* \w name|strong="H8034"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w exalted|strong="H7682"\w*.

\w Sing|strong="H2167"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w He|strong="H3588"\w* \w has|strong="H3068"\w* \w done|strong="H6213"\w* glorious \w things|strong="H3605"\w*. Let \w this|strong="H2063"\w* \w be|strong="H3068"\w* \w known|strong="H3045"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* earth.

\w Cry|strong="H6670"\w* \w out|strong="H7442"\w* \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w sing|strong="H7442"\w*, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* citizen \w of|strong="H3427"\w* \w Zion|strong="H6726"\w*, \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w great|strong="H1419"\w* \w among|strong="H7130"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w is|strong="H3478"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w Holy|strong="H6918"\w* \w One|strong="H6918"\w* \w of|strong="H3427"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.”
